recipe_10521.Description:
Attempt to extract one of the magic powers of a main-hand weapon, destroying the weapon in the process. The chosen power will match the associated skill of the crystal you provide. (If no powers match the crystal, you get nothing!)

NOTE: in addition to the listed ingredients, this recipe also consumes Main-Hand Beads from your inventory. You must have at least as many Main-Hand Beads as the skill level of the power you extract, or the process will fail. (Thus you might need up to 60 Main-Hand Beads for a level 60 power.)
recipe_10521.Name: Extract Main-Hand Augment

recipe_10522.Description:
Attempt to extract one of the magic powers of an off-hand weapon or shield, destroying it in the process. The chosen power will match the associated skill of the crystal you provide. (If no powers match the crystal, you get nothing!)

NOTE: in addition to the listed ingredients, this recipe also consumes Off-Hand Beads from your inventory. You must have at least as many Off-Hand Beads as the skill level of the power you extract, or the process will fail. (Thus you might need up to 60 Off-Hand Beads for a level 60 power.)
recipe_10522.Name: Extract Off-Hand Augment

recipe_10523.Description:
Attempt to extract one of the magic powers of a pair of gloves, destroying them in the process. The chosen power will match the associated skill of the crystal you provide. (If no powers match the crystal, you get nothing!)

NOTE: in addition to the listed ingredients, this recipe also consumes Glove Beads from your inventory. You must have at least as many Glove Beads as the skill level of the power you extract, or the process will fail. (Thus you might need up to 60 Glove Beads for a level 60 power.)
recipe_10523.Name: Extract Glove Augment

recipe_10524.Description:
Attempt to extract one of the magic powers of a piece of chest armor, destroying it in the process. The chosen power will match the associated skill of the crystal you provide. (If no powers match the crystal, you get nothing!)

NOTE: in addition to the listed ingredients, this recipe also consumes Chest Baubles from your inventory. You must have at least as many Chest Baubles as the skill level of the power you extract, or the process will fail. (Thus you might need up to 60 Chest Baubles for a level 60 power.)
recipe_10524.Name: Extract Chest Augment

recipe_10525.Description:
Attempt to extract one of the magic powers of a piece of leg armor, destroying it in the process. The chosen power will match the associated skill of the crystal you provide. (If no powers match the crystal, you get nothing!)

NOTE: in addition to the listed ingredients, this recipe also consumes Leg Baubles from your inventory. You must have at least as many Leg Baubles as the skill level of the power you extract, or the process will fail. (Thus you might need up to 60 Leg Baubles for a level 60 power.)
recipe_10525.Name: Extract Leg Augment

recipe_10526.Description:

You must have at least as many Helm Contraptions as the skill level of the power you extract, or the process will fail. (Thus you might need up to 60 Helm Contraptions for a level 60 power.)

recipe_10711.Description: Use a prism to restore 5%-10% of an item's transmutation durability. After using this recipe on an item, you must wait 12 hours before the item can be further repaired.
recipe_10711.Name: Repair Transmutation Damage 1

recipe_10712.Description: Use 2 prisms to restore 10%-20% of an item's transmutation durability. After using this recipe on an item, you must wait 1.5 days before the item can be further repaired.
recipe_10712.Name: Repair Transmutation Damage 2

recipe_10713.Description: Use 4 prisms to restore 30%-60% of an item's transmutation durability. After using this recipe on an item, you must wait 4 days before the item can be further repaired.
recipe_10713.Name: Repair Transmutation Damage 3

recipe_10714.Description: Use 6 prisms to restore 60%-100% of an item's transmutation durability. After using this recipe on an item, you must wait 6 days before the item can be further repaired.
recipe_10714.Name: Repair Transmutation Damage 4

recipe_10715.Description: Use 8 prisms to restore 100% of an item's transmutation durability. After using this recipe on an item, you must wait 7 days before the item can be further repaired.
recipe_10715.Name: Repair Transmutation Damage 5
